description: At sheridan's research center I used MatLab, C++, Typescript and machine learning to detect when when people fell. I worked with PointClickCare into implementing a solution that was able to detect if someone has fallen or not
I graduated from Sheridan's Software Development and Network Engineering course with a 3.84 GPA. At Sheridan There was lot's of hands on learning and real world projects with coops.
While at Maple leaf foods I worked on multiple projects  (IOS, C#, .Net MVC5 and Core, as well as react + typescript). Helped extend backend and frontend functionality for IOS Plant down time app.

Developed lots of skills working with Typescript and Angular 2+. Was given tasks to setup new projects Angular 2+ projects. UsedAzure, VSTS, Angular 2+, .Net Core 2, and NoSql to quickly develop user interface, and anticipate and react to UX needs
